full_summary:
# Notice of Proposed Procurement
## Solicitation No. SSC-24-00027100:T
### Tender Closing Date: August 14, 2024, at 2:00 p.m. (14:00:00)

The Shared Services Canada intends to solicit a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the supply and delivery of MacBooks to Natural Resources Canada.

## Brief Description
Natural Resources Canada requires the supply and delivery of three (3) 14-inch MacBook Pro Z1AW or equivalent and five (5) 16-inch MacBook Pro Z1AH or equivalent. The delivery destination is Ottawa, Ontario, within 30 federal government working days from contract award.

## Additional Requirements
* No security requirements or comprehensive land claim agreements are applicable to this project.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.

## Tenders Evaluation Criteria
Tenders will be evaluated based on a price evaluation and criteria. The price evaluation will include the overall price of the bid, and any applicable shipping or handling costs.

## General Information
* Accredited suppliers can register and access the solicitation through the Shared Service Canada portal at https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/
* All tender documents may be prepared in either official language of Canada (English or French).
* Any written inquiries related to this solicitation must be directed to: Sebastien Darif, Procurement Officer, Shared Services Canada, 99 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 1E3 (613) 866-5465 or Sebastienmajd.darif@ssc-spc.gc.ca

## Contact Person
Nicole Curry
Contact Information:
Phone Number: (343) 630-1688
Address: 99 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 1E3
